title: Billionaire Wives Club: Escorting The Daredevil
description:
From the new and promising author Dalia Daudelin comes a steamy story about three escorts. These are high class call girls who, after a fateful night at a party full of billionaire businessmen, each have a reason to quit their jobs. Escorting The Daredevil tells the exciting story of Elise, who meets Derek Gutfeld, the son of a Texan businessman who loves fast cars and anything dangerous. When he takes her back home after a terrifying and exhilarating joyride, he pays for a night with her that starts with a knife pressed against her neck.This 5000 word story gives you a glimpse into the world of BDSM and thrill-seeking billionaires.
  [image]

  [image]
author: Dalia Daudelin
